GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v5.4.119
GSD.description:
bus: qcom: Put child node before return

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.119 by commit 3a76ec28824c01b57aa1f0927841d75e4f167cb8, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 335a127548081322bd2b294d715418648912f20c. For more details please see the references link.
